casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Angela Deborah LEWIS. No. 558PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC. Paul M. Green, Durham, for Angela Deborah Lewis.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 9th day of March 2006 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd day of August 2007."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th day of March 2006 by Attorney General in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd day of August 2007."
